definition: to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

sentences.english: Cathaya argyrophylla forest is a famous Tertiary relict phytocommunity-in the world.
sentences.chinese: 銀杉林是當今舉世矚目的第三紀殘遺植物羣落。

sentences.english: He was an unrivalled talent, but unfortunately at the wrong time.
sentences.chinese: 他是個舉世無雙的奇才，可惜生不逢時。

sentences.english: The harmful accident of students has become social hot problem all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 學生傷害事故已成爲舉世關注的社會熱點問題。

sentences.english: The frescos in the Sistine Chapel are world-famous.
sentences.chinese: 西斯廷教堂的壁畫舉世聞名。

sentences.english: The analgesic effects of acupuncture are well-documented.
sentences.chinese: 鍼灸止痛的效果是舉世公認的。

sentences.english: There once a boy named Harry. Destined to be a star.
sentences.chinese: 有個男孩叫哈利，他註定要受舉世矚目。

sentences.english: It's just these heart-thrilling chapters that brought his work world renown.
sentences.chinese: 正因這些扣人心絃的篇章才使得他的作品舉世聞名。

sentences.english: Xi'an is a world-famous city for her ancient culture.
sentences.chinese: 西安是一座舉世聞名的文化古城。

sentences.english: China has scored notable achievements over the past 30-odd years since reform and opening-up.
sentences.chinese: 中國改革開放30多年來，取得舉世矚目的發展成就。

sentences.english: The floor is paved with a rare white marble known as the 'Greek Crystal'.
sentences.chinese: 地面採用舉世罕見的希臘水晶白大理石。

sentences.english: The parades in Beijing in a few days time will be watched worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 十月一日將在北京舉行的慶典舉世矚目。

sentences.english: It says the UK is already widely recognised as one of the best prepared countries in the world.
sentences.chinese: 英國已經是舉世公認的一個準備得最好的國家之一。

sentences.english: Welcome to HongKong, a peerless city in entire world.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎蒞臨香港，一個舉世無雙的城市。
重慶火鍋也是舉世聞名的。

sentences.english: The world-famous Stone Forest lies within Lunan County.
sentences.chinese: 舉世聞名的石林勝景位於路南縣境內。
